short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download any Luminus quiz to a PDF file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows for downloading quizzes on LumiNUS, as printing the page does not work properly.

Currently it supports downloading the quiz to PDF and HTML file formats.
